Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

If someone creates an unneccesary poll 
after this one, and those following 
that one, should we? 

  o Castrate Them 
  o Burn them at a stake 
  o Hang them 
  o put them in front of a firing squad 
  o tie them to a rocket, send them to the moon which upon impact have them sacrificed to the almighty Whee and Jume Gods. 
  o bury them alive 
  o Keelhaul them 
  o Chop off their hands 
  o Chop off each of their limbs starting at the tips and then cut an inch each time and if they pass out from the pain dunk them in water to wake them up, repeat as needed until they agree to do no more polls 
  o Whee!! 
  o Jume!! 
  o Uh yeah,, sure... what ever you say sexy.. err god what the hell happened to you? 
  o Whee do them all... I think... 
  o Eh just plain kill them 
  o Hmmm kneecap Yan for the hell of it. 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/polls 

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
